channel.title: Spring JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPR-28] NoSuchMethodError in Caucho Burlap invocation
item.description:
During JPetstore startup, the following error occurs (with respective stack trace):

[15:00:18.537] java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: com.caucho.burlap.server.BurlapSkele
ton.<init>(Ljava/lang/Object;)V

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Already fixed in CVS for 1.0 RC1. Root cause is an incompatible change in Hessian and Burlap, between Resin 2.x and 3.x. Spring now auto-detects the actual version. To fix this with M4, try setting Resin's "servlet-classloader-hack" to true, forcing precedence for web app libraries over server classes. Juergen
